availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John Baldwin Poyntz (Mason County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Mason County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of William Poyntz and Mary Poyntz. Married to Kate Schultz Poyntz in Mason County, Kentucky, on July 10, 1850. Father of Jennie Poyntz, Samuel Poyntz, Julia Poyntz, and Lottie Poyntz. Bookkeeper in Mason County, Kentucky, in 1850. Household owned seven enslaved persons in Mason County in 1850. Farmer in Mason County in 1860. Owned three enslaved persons in Mason County in 1860. Farmer in Mason County in 1863.
